entry.title: [GRA2][Web Hosting] - Maintenance on all cluster
entry.content:

Mar 20, 21:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 28, 14:47 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the maintenance.

Please find below an update on the situation:
New start time : 20/03/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 21/03/2025 00:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance, you may experience some disruptions to our services on all impacted clusters. Specifically:
â¢ Suspension of traffic from AI and content indexing bots and crawlers on all impacted clusters: To prevent any potential issues, we will temporarily suspend traffic from AI and content indexing bots and crawlers on all impacted clusters.
â¢ Possible slowness on perso/pro offers : You may notice slower loading times or delayed responses when accessing your website or applications.
In addition :
â¢ Possible slowness on metrics or logs on clusters 002 / 005 / 007 / 010 / 012 / 013 / 014 / 017 : Metrics and logs access may be delayed or slow during the maintenance period.
â¢ Possible slowness on mails on clusters 005 / 017 : Sending mail from websites may be delayed or slow during the maintenance period.
â¢ Slowness on operations on clusters 011 / 014 / 017
Service improvement : This maintenance is link to : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/ndkfnxy1ylv4

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
